channel.title: Simple Church for Simple People
channel.description: In this podcast I share lessons I've learned since planting a house church in January of 2004.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Old Feed
channel.itunes:author: Chad Irving
channel.itunes:summary: In this podcast I share lessons I've learned since planting a house church in January of 2004.

item.title: Children & Simple Church--2009 Update
item.description: This is a podcast with my wife Tricia discussing our experiences with kids in our church, especially how things have changed over the last two years since my original podcast about kids and simple church.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast with my wife Tricia discussing our experiences with kids in our church, especially how things have changed over the last two years since my original podcast about kids and simple church.

item.title: Decision-Making by Consensus
item.description: I sometimes hear conventional church people say that consensus governance is impossible. I know by experience that it is not only possible, but wonderfully beneficial. Our house church makes decisions by consensus, and it has been a blessing for us. In this podcast I discuss why it works in the organic setting and some of the benefits we've experienced.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: I sometimes hear conventional church people say that consensus governance is impossible. I know by experience that it is not only possible, but wonderfully beneficial. Our house church makes decisions by consensus, and it has been a blessing for us. In this podcast I discuss why it works in the organic setting and some of the benefits we've experienced.

item.title: Simple Church Multiplication
item.description: In this episode I share my experiences amd advice in regards to multiplication.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: In this episode I share my experiences amd advice in regards to multiplication.

item.title: House Church: Fantasy, Ideal, and Reality.
item.description: I went into starting a house church with a fantasy about what it should look like. Reality was a different story. Turns out the ideal is somewhere in between. Recognizing both fantasy and reality is helping me strive towards the ideal.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: I went into starting a house church with a fantasy about what it should look like. Reality was a different story. Turns out the ideal is somewhere in between. Recognizing both fantasy and reality is helping me strive towards the ideal.

item.title: What Does it Take to Plant a Simple Church?
item.description: New Episode. What does it take to plant a simple church? I'm sure there are many things that could be said, but these are three from my experience.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: New Episode. What does it take to plant a simple church? I'm sure there are many things that could be said, but these are three from my experience.

item.title: Interview with my wife Tricia
item.description: Repost--I'm no Larry King when it comes to interviewing, but I thought some people might like to hear a spouse's perspective.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: Repost--I'm no Larry King when it comes to interviewing, but I thought some people might like to hear a spouse's perspective.

item.title: Buildings, Budgets, and Big Shots
item.description: Neil Cole calls these three roadblocks to multiplication. I agree.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: Neil Cole calls these three roadblocks to multiplication. I agree.

item.title: I'm back!
item.description: Finally! I wanted to let you know about the new name for our nonprofit--Organic Church Resource and that I've made updates to the website including a bookstore. Check it out at organicchurchresource.org. I will be doing new podcasts starting in June. I'll also be reposting 2 or 3 older episodes before the end of May.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: Finally! I wanted to let you know about the new name for our nonprofit--Organic Church Resource and that I've made updates to the website including a bookstore. Check it out at organicchurchresource.org. I will be doing new podcasts starting in June. I'll also be reposting 2 or 3 older episodes before the end of May.

item.title: Church: More than Baptisms
item.description: Though some people choose to measure church health by baptisms, I think this method is highly inadequate.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: Though some people choose to measure church health by baptisms, I think this method is highly inadequate.

item.title: Q and A-- Apostles, planting, and giving
item.description: In the episode I discuss issues regarding apostles and authority/accountability in starting a house church, and giving in the house church.

item.title: The Blurry line of Church
item.description: My distinct lines of church have become blurry.

item.title: Organized Religion--am I still in it?
item.description: I used to be annoyed by people who criticized organized religion, but like so many other things, my outlook is a little different now.
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
item.itunes:summary: I used to be annoyed by people who criticized organized religion, but like so many other things, my outlook is a little different now.

item.title: Houses That Change the World, Part 6
item.description: Today I'm reading and discussing the following sections from Wolfgang Simson's book, "Houses That Change the Word,"If you want to multiply churches, stop planting churches'' and 'The carpet.'
item.dc:creator: Chad Irving
